text: The Knight Capital Group is an American global financial services firm engaging in market making, electronic execution, and institutional sales and trading. With its high-frequency trading algorithms Knight was the largest trader in U.S. equities, with a market share of 17.3% on NYSE and 16.9% on NASDAQ. Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in New Jersey Category:Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Companies based in New Jersey
title: Knight Capital Group
